content: I have a question about this page: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-order-catalog/labservices.html#LabServicesSearchRetrieve

I don't see a parameter to be able to say, "I''m searching in the context of a particular patient", where the patient's age, billing status, or institition may affect the type of tests that can be ordered. Has this kind of use case been considered?

I presume that the question of a profile of PlanDefinition vs a LabOrderable Resource has been discussed ad nauseum but it's not a closed subject, I think the profile here shows that this should be it's own resource, not a profile on PlanDefinition. https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-order-catalog/StructureDefinition-LabServiceDefinition.html
It feels like there are two separate things being modeled there, one is the orderable itself, and the other is the protocol associated with ordering the item. Am I misinterpreting the intent?
